ixln::CFileXmlWriteArchive

 CFileXmlWriteArchive (const istd::CString &filePath, const iser::IVersionInfo *versionInfoPtr=NULL, bool serializeHeader=true, const iser::CArchiveTag &rootTag=s_acfRootTag)

Detailed Description

XERCES-based implementation of archive for writing in XML format.

Please note that it doesn't create counter attribute needed by iser::CXmlFileReadArchive.
